Leaderboard npm package  

Description

A simple, lightweight and generic leaderboard module created in vanilla javascript. You can create multiple leaderboards on one page and set different options for each. Visit the Github Page to see the module API.
NPM
npm install leaderboard-table
YARN
yarn add leaderboard-table
CDN JS
https://unpkg.com/browse/leaderboard-table@1.0.3/dist/leaderboard.min.js
CDN CSS
https://unpkg.com/browse/leaderboard-table@1.0.3/dist/leaderboard.min.css
Examples
Simple leaderboard

Simples leaderboard setup with default options.

Root field in Leaderboard class instance stands for your html container, which will hold Leaderboard module. LeaderboardData will hold and parse your data, which you want to show. 

    const usersLeaderboardRoot = document.getElementById("users-leaderboard-root");

     const  usersScoreLeaderboard = new Leaderboard({
            usersLeaderboardRoot,
            [
                    {
                                name: "Peter",
                                score: 20
                    },
                    {
                                name: "Bob",
                                score: 50
                    }
            ]
    })

    usersLeaderboardRoot.init();
